text: Zhang Ze was the defending champion but lost in the third round to Bai Yan. Chung Hyeon won the title after defeating Yūichi Sugita 6–4, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Chengdu Challenger - Singles 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Chengdu Challenger – Singles
